title: Plumbago auriculata
Vernacular name:
English- Plumbago, Cape Leadwort
Hindi- Nila Chitrak
Chemical Constituents: flavonoids, alkaloids, glycosides, saponins, steroids, tannins, triterpenoids, coumarins and phenolic compounds
Therapeutic uses: Used as influential astringent, cooling, regenerating agent and also used for the treatments of leprosy, leucoderma, toothache, fractures, diarrhoea, passive haemorrhage, and dysentery, bruises and diabetes.
